dataList.content:
Rarely, you may obtain <color=#f8c200>[Huge Gift Sack]</color> from clearing Event Stages, Main Story Stages, or Dungeons.
<color=#f8c200>[Huge Gift Sack]</color> is converted to ?? <color=#f8c200>[Gift Sack]</color>.

Clear Event Stages, Main Story Stages, or Dungeons to earn <color=#f8c200>[Gift Sack]</color>.

You can redeem various rewards from the <color=#f8c200>[Gift Sack Box]</color> based on the number of <color=#f8c200>[Gift Sack]</color> you have.
